name: determinative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is determinative, it is the thing that controls, influences, or decides something: determinative factor Sometimes, price may be the determinative factor.determinative of Most cases do not involve biological evidence that can be determinative of guilt or innocence.
More examplesFewer examplesThis is one of many factors to be considered, but it is not determinative. The exact timing of relevant events is determinative of this issue. Socioeconomic status is believed to play a determinative role in many aspects of individual growth in childhood.
